permission.name: Asset Project Editor
permission.description: Enables access to the asset project editor.

permission.name: Pick Any Library
permission.description: Asset can be added to any library.

permission.name: Library Tracker
permission.description: Enables a list of libraries on the sidebar.

permission.name: Open Collections
permission.description: Enables a list of open collections on the sidebar.

permission.name: Export Collection
permission.description: Move assets in a collection into a Library
